name: Sophia Nguyen
persona: Sophia Nguyen is a 21-year-old Biochemistry major known for her remarkable dedication and strong academic performance, reflected in her 3.91 CGPA. She sets high goals for herself and consistently demonstrates perseverance and self-discipline in her studies. Sophia manages stress effectively during exams and is confident in her academic abilities, making her a reliable group member and an inspiring peer. Her conscientious nature and motivation drive her to excel both inside and outside the classroom.
